info.title: Django CFG API
info.description: Complete API documentation for Django CFG Demo Project

post.description: Request OTP code to email or phone.
Verify OTP code and return JWT tokens.

get.description: Retrieve the current authenticated user's profile information.

post.description: Upload avatar image for the current authenticated user. Accepts multipart/form-data with 'avatar' field.

avatar.description: Avatar image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP, max 5MB)

put.description: Partially update the current authenticated user's profile information. Supports avatar upload.

patch.description: Partially update the current authenticated user's profile information. Supports avatar upload.

put.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile information.

patch.description: Update the current authenticated user's profile information.

post.description: Refresh JWT token.

get.description: Generate JWT token for WebSocket connection to Centrifugo. Token includes user's allowed channels based on their permissions. Requires authentication.
Get statistics per channel.
Returns the current health status of the Centrifugo client.
Returns overview statistics for Centrifugo publishes.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Statistics period in hours (default: 24)

get.description: Returns a paginated list of recent Centrifugo publishes with their details. Uses standard DRF pagination.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: Filter by channel name

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Items per page (default: 10, max: 100)

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by status (success, failed, timeout, pending, partial)

get.description: Returns statistics grouped by channel.

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Statistics period in hours (default: 24)

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Time interval: 'hour' or 'day' (default: hour)

post.description: Returns JWT token and config for WebSocket connection to Centrifugo.
Returns list of active channels with optional pattern filter.
Returns message history for a channel.
Returns server information including node count, version, and uptime.
Returns list of clients currently subscribed to a channel.
Returns quick statistics about channel presence (num_clients, num_users).
Publish test message to Centrifugo via wrapper with optional ACK tracking.
Publish message using CentrifugoClient with database logging. This will create CentrifugoLog records.
Manually send ACK for a message to the wrapper. Pass message_id in request body.

get.description: Get current user balance and transaction statistics
Returns list of available currencies with token+network info

ViewSet for payment operations.

Endpoints:
- GET /payments/ - List user's payments
- GET /payments/{id}/ - Get payment details
- POST /payments/create/ - Create new payment
- GET /payments/{id}/status/ - Check payment status
- POST /payments/{id}/confirm/ - Confirm payment

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A page number within the paginated result set.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

get.description:
ViewSet for payment operations.

Endpoints:
- GET /payments/ - List user's payments
- GET /payments/{id}/ - Get payment details
- POST /payments/create/ - Create new payment
- GET /payments/{id}/status/ - Check payment status
- POST /payments/{id}/confirm/ - Confirm payment

post.description:
POST /api/v1/payments/{id}/confirm/

Confirm payment (user clicked "I have paid").
Checks status with provider and creates transaction if completed.

get.description:
GET /api/v1/payments/{id}/status/?refresh=true

Check payment status (with optional refresh from provider).

Query params:
- refresh: boolean (default: false) - Force refresh from provider

post.description:
POST /api/v1/payments/create/

Create new payment.

Request body:
{
    "amount_usd": "100.00",
    "currency_code": "USDTTRC20",
    "description": "Optional description"
}

content_type.description:
Content classification

* `document` - Document

* `image` - Image

* `archive` - Archive

Command.description:
Django management command serializer.

Includes security metadata from base classes (SafeCommand, InteractiveCommand, etc.):
- web_executable: Can be executed via web interface
- requires_input: Requires interactive user input
- is_destructive: Modifies or deletes data

command.description: Name of the Django management command

ConfigData.description:
Serializer for complete config data endpoint.

Returns both DjangoConfig and Django settings with validation info.

django_settings.description: Complete Django settings (sanitized, contains mixed types)

_validation.title: validation
_validation.description: Validation result comparing serializer with actual config

missing_in_serializer.description: Fields present in config but missing in serializer

extra_in_serializer.description: Fields present in serializer but not in config

period_hours.description: Period in hours for all charts

DashboardOverview.description:
Main serializer for dashboard overview endpoint.
Uses typed serializers for proper OpenAPI schema generation.

DjangoConfig.description:
Typed serializer for user's DjangoConfig settings.

Reflects the actual structure of DjangoConfig model.
All passwords and sensitive data are sanitized before reaching this serializer.

ScheduleCreateRequest.description:
Serializer for creating a scheduled job.

Supports three scheduling methods:
1. scheduled_time: Schedule job at specific time
2. interval: Schedule job to repeat at intervals
3. cron: Schedule job with cron expression

queue_name.description: Queue name to schedule job in

interval.description: Schedule job to repeat every N seconds

cron.description: Cron expression (e.g., '0 0 * * *' for daily at midnight)

repeat.description: Number of times to repeat (None = infinite)
